thread.section_title: Hotel Duette - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel Durette
thread.title_full: Hotel Durette - Review of Hotel Duette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Liz John C
title: Hotel Durette
text:
Just back from 3 day trip to Paris, this hotel has small but clean rooms but very very comfortable, modern and so quiet at night, lovely local bars. It's less than 5 min walk to metro which is 4 stops to the centre of Paris. Would definetly use this hotel again.
Room Tip: Don't expect a big room, but extremely clean and comfortable. See more room tips
